data.prayer: Lord, the the state of GrandBassa will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of GrandBassa, Liberia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of GrandBassa, Liberia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of GrandBassa who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of GrandBassa to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Maninka, Eastern people. Make the Maninka, Eastern people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of GrandBassa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of GrandBassa.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of GrandBassa, Liberia has a population of 224,800.

We estimate GrandBassa has 26,249 people who might know Jesus, 63,723 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134,827 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 26,249 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: GrandBassa
location.people_groups_list: Mende, Arab, Lebanese, Dewoin, Deaf, Dan
